title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your family account and preferences

children.title: Manage Children
children.subtitle: Add, edit, or remove children from your family
children.name: Name
children.pinInfo: PIN is used for child login on shared devices
children.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name}? This will delete all their data.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.taskCompletedDesc: Get notified when a child completes a task
notifications.rewardPurchasedDesc: Get notified when a child purchases a reward
notifications.weeklyReportDesc: Receive a weekly summary of family activity

security.title: Security
security.twoFactorDesc: Add an extra layer of security

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
danger.deleteConfirm: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.

page.childrenDesc: Manage your children's profiles and settings
page.deviceAccessDesc: Share login codes with your children
page.loginSecurityDesc: Manage PIN requirements for child accounts
page.name: Name

invite.title: Invite Co-Parent
invite.shareInstructions: Share this link with your co-parent. They can sign in or create an account to join your family.
invite.shareText: I'd like you to join our family on EarnQuest! Click the link to get started.

pinToggle.title: Require PIN for Children
pinToggle.descriptionEnabled: Children must enter a 4-digit PIN to access their dashboard
pinToggle.descriptionDisabled: Children can access their dashboard without a PIN
pinToggle.infoEnabled: Each child uses their PIN above to log in. Default PIN is 0000.
pinToggle.infoDisabled: Anyone with your family code can access any child account. Consider enabling PINs for added security.

disableDialog.title: Disable PIN Requirement?
disableDialog.description: This will allow children to access their accounts without entering a PIN code.
disableDialog.warningDescription: Anyone with your family code can access any child's account. Only disable this if your children's devices are already secured.

toast.pinSameAsCurrent: PIN is the same as current

instructions.childDevice: Your child can enter this code when opening the app on their device
instructions.generateNew: Generate a new code anytime if needed

regenerateDialog.title: Generate New Code?
regenerateDialog.description: This will stop the old code from working. Any child using the old code will need to log in again with the new code.
regenerateDialog.warningDescription: Children will need the new code to access their accounts
